name: Thought Bubble Forest
description:
A landscape of poetry written and based of real memories, Thought Bubble Forest is a way to explore and move events in a 3D world. Using vivid colors, interactive landscapes and dynamic soundscapes, Thought Bubble Forest allows players to physically alter the space by moving the memories.

Directions
If using computer, use mouse to look around, click to shoot, use WASD to move, space to jump.
If using ps4 controller, R2 is shoot, X is jump, joysticks do the thing. Haven't tested on other gamepads, you'll  have to figure it out.
